structural_units.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The lectures introduce the general principles of statistical data analysis (from data description to confidence intervals and the most commonly used simple statistical tests). The free software R is used in the practicals, with the help of which the knowledge gained in the lectures is applied to real data.
description.et: Loengutes tutvustatakse statistilise andmeanalüüsi üldpõhimõtteid (andmekirjeldusest usaldusvahemike ja enamkasutatavate lihtsate statistiliste testideni). Praktikates kasutatakse vaba tarkvara R, mille abil loengutes saadud teadmisi reaalsetele andmetele rakendatakse.

objectives.en: Acquisition of basic biostatistical knowledge and skills necessary for medical research.
objectives.et: Meditsiiniuuringuteks vajalike biostatistika põhiteadmiste ja oskuste omandamine.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the subject:
* is familiar with relevant biostatistics methods for clinical pharmaceutical research
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb kliinilise farmaatsiauuringute jaoks asjakohaseid biostatistika meetodeid

learning_outcomes.en: * knows different types of data and knows how to associate them with the appropriate statistical data analysis method
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb erinevat tüüpi andmeid ja oskab neid seostada sobiva statistilise andmeanalüüsi meetodiga

learning_outcomes.en: * knows how to enter study data correctly
* understands what types of features are involved
learning_outcomes.et: * mõistab, mis tüüpi funktsioone see hõlmab

learning_outcomes.en: * can find descriptive statistics: mean, standard deviation, median, quartiles, minimum, maximum, standard error
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab leida kirjeldavat statistikat: keskmine, standardhälve, mediaan, kvartiilid, miinimum, maksimum, standardviga

learning_outcomes.en: * can illustrate his data with appropriate tables and graphs
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab illustreerida oma andmeid sobivate tabelite ja graafikutega

learning_outcomes.en: * can make simpler statistical comparisons (parametric and non-parametric methods).
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab teha lihtsamaid statistilisi võrdlusi (parameetrilised ja mitteparameetrilised meetodid).
